languages.text: While in combat, the wearer of this cloak gains a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} whenever there are no enemies in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: While in combat, the wearer of this cloak gains a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} whenever there are no enemies in a 4-cell radius.

While in combat, the wearer of this cloak gains a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} whenever there are no enemies in a 4-cell radius.

languages.text: 当装备者4格内没有任何敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}提高15点。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}
languages.original_text: While in combat, the wearer of this cloak gains a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} whenever there are no enemies in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者4格内没有任何敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}提高15点。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}

languages.text: Дает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} +15 в бою, если в радиусе 4 клеток нет врагов.
languages.original_text: While in combat, the wearer of this cloak gains a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} whenever there are no enemies in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Дает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} +15 в бою, если в радиусе 4 клеток нет врагов.
Дает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} +15 в бою, если в радиусе 4 клеток нет врагов.

languages.text: 戦闘中、半径4セル以内に敵がいない場合、+15の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を付与。
languages.original_text: While in combat, the wearer of this cloak gains a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} whenever there are no enemies in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中、半径4セル以内に敵がいない場合、+15の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を付与。

languages.text: En combate, el portador de esta capa gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +15 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} cuando no haya enemigos en un radio de 4 casillas.
languages.original_text: While in combat, the wearer of this cloak gains a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} whenever there are no enemies in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: En combate, el portador de esta capa gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +15 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} cuando no haya enemigos en un radio de 4 casillas.

languages.text: Während des Kampfes erhält der Träger dieses Umhangs einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +15 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, immer wenn sich keine Feinde in einem 4-Felder-Radius befinden.
languages.original_text: While in combat, the wearer of this cloak gains a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} whenever there are no enemies in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Während des Kampfes erhält der Träger dieses Umhangs einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +15 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, immer wenn sich keine Feinde in einem 4-Felder-Radius befinden.

languages.text: Lorsqu'aucun ennemi n'est présent dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'utilisateur de cette cape, celui-ci reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} de +15.
languages.original_text: While in combat, the wearer of this cloak gains a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} whenever there are no enemies in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'aucun ennemi n'est présent dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'utilisateur de cette cape, celui-ci reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g} de +15.
